get.description: Lists the streams available to the user.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Only return streams that exactly match the given name.

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Maximum number of returned results.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Skip the first (offset) results. Used together with max for paging.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort the returned results by the given field.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Control whether the results are sorted in ascending or descending order.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Returns streams that contain the given search term in their name or description.

parameters.name: public
parameters.description: If true, includes publicly available resources in the results.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Stream object

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the stream to be fetched

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the stream to be updated

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: StreamCreateRequest object

delete.description: Deletes a stream by id. This will also delete all data for this stream. Use with caution!

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the stream to be deleted

get.description:
Lists the permissions to given stream.
 Requires 'share' permission or ownership.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: ID of the stream

403.description: No sharing rights to the stream

post.description:
Grant a new permission to given stream.
 Requires 'share' permission or ownership.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: ID of the stream

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Requested permission (id ignored)

200.description: New stream permission object that was created

403.description: No sharing rights to the stream

get.description:
Returns one stream-user-operation relationship object by its unique id. 
 Requires 'share' permission or ownership.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: ID of the stream

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: ID of the permission to be fetched

403.description: No sharing rights to the stream

404.description: Stream or permission object wasn't found

delete.description:
Deletes a stream permission by id.
 Requires 'share' permission or ownership.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: ID of the stream

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: ID of the permission to be deleted

403.description: No sharing rights to the stream

get.description: Lists (and optionally filters) canvases in your archive.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter results by canvas name.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Filter results by canvas state.

parameters.name: adhoc
parameters.description: Filter canvases by their adhoc-ness.

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Maximum number of returned results.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Skip the first (offset) results. Used together with max for paging.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort the returned results by the given field.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Control whether the results are sorted in ascending or descending order.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Returns canvases that contain the given search term in their name.

parameters.name: public
parameters.description: If true, includes publicly available resources in the results.

post.description: Creates a new canvas into your archive.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Canvas object

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the canvas to be fetched

put.description: Updates a canvas. The *id* field can not be updated.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the canvas to be updated

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: New canvas details

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the canvas to be deleted

post.description: Starts a canvas changing its state to 'running', or in the case of adhoc=true, creates a copy of the Canvas with state 'running'.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the live canvas to be started

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: runtime options

post.description: Stops a canvas that is currently running.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the live canvas to be stopped

204.description: Success, and Canvas was set to delete on stop, and thus is was deleted

get.description:
Lists the permissions to given canvas.
 Requires 'share' permission or ownership.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the canvas

403.description: No sharing rights to the canvas

post.description:
Grant a new permission to given canvas.
 Requires 'share' permission or ownership.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the canvas

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Requested permission (id ignored)

200.description: New canvas permission object that was created

403.description: No sharing rights to the canvas

get.description:
Returns one canvas-user-operation relationship object by its unique id. 
 Requires 'share' permission or ownership.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the canvas

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: ID of the permission to be fetched

403.description: No sharing rights to the canvas

404.description: Canvas or permission object wasn't found

delete.description:
Deletes a canvas permission by id.
 Requires 'share' permission or ownership.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the canvas

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: ID of the permission to be deleted

403.description: No sharing rights to the canvas

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Only return dashboards that exactly match the given name.

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Maximum number of returned results.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Skip the first (offset) results. Used together with max for paging.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort the returned results by the given field.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Control whether the results are sorted in ascending or descending order.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Returns dashboards that contain the given search term in their name.

parameters.name: public
parameters.description: If true, includes publicly available resources in the results.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Dashboard object

422.description: Request body did not pass validation

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Dashboard to be fetched

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Dashboard to be updated

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: New Dashboard details

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Dashboard to be deleted

get.description: Get Items of Dashboard by id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Dashboard whose Items are to be fetched

post.description: Creates a new Dashboard Item associated with a Dashboard.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the associated Dashboard

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Dashboard Item

403.description: Not allowed to add Item to Dashboard

422.description: Request body did not pass validation

get.description: Get Dashboard Item from associated Dashboard

parameters.name: dashboardId
parameters.description: ID of the Dashboard

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Dashboard Item

404.description: Dashboard or Dashboard Item not found

put.description: Updates an existing Dashboard Item associated with a Dashboard

parameters.name: dashboardId
parameters.description: ID of the Dashboard

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Dashboard Item

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: New Dashboard Item details

404.description: Dashboard or Dashboard Item not found

422.description: Request body did not pass validation

delete.description: Deletes a Dashboard Item and disassociates it from its parent Dashboard

parameters.name: dashboardId
parameters.description: ID of the Dashboard

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Dashboard Item

403.description: Not allowed to delete item from Dashboard

404.description: Dashboard or Dashboard Item not found

apiKey.description: Api key needed to produce data to this stream.

fields.description: An array containing field definitions for this stream.

hasExports.description: whether module uses exported inputs or outputs

serialized.description: indicates whether there exists a serialization of this canvas

adhoc.description: set to true for adhoc canvas

live.description: set to true for live canvas (not historical)

beginDate.description: begin date (historical mode) to start feeding from

endDate.description: end date (historical mode) to stop feeding at

numOfItems.description: number of items contained in Dashboard

ord.description: positive integer indicating order within Dashboard

uiChannelId.description: id of the ui channel of this item

ord.description: positive integer indicating order within Dashboard

uiChannelId.description: id of the ui channel of this item

clearState.description: If true, previously saved state will be cleared before starting canvas.

id.description: Unique identifier for this permission object

user.description: User who was granted the permission

operation.description: User rights that this permission enables, e.g. 'read', 'write', 'share'

code.description: Error code (e.g. "NOT_FOUND") for recognizing error type automatically.

message.description: A human-readable message describing the error.
